title: 99/556/EC: Commission Decision of 20 July 1999 amending Decision 95/473/EC establishing the list of approved fish farms in France (notified under document number C(1999) 2153) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION
of 20 July 1999
amending Decision 95/473/EC establishing the list of approved fish farms in France
(notified under document number C(1999) 2153)
(Text with EEA relevance)
(1999/556/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 95/473/EC is replaced by the Annex hereto.
This Decision is adressed to the Member States.
attachments:
